page.title: 09Shops
page.content: {SHOPS {____________ {We suggest for visitors {mainly.........}cafe 7, hotel 3, restaurant 3, pub 1, wine bar 2, gift 6, camping 1, antiques 1, empty 7, off licence 1.{FOR THE VILLAGERS >>>>>.... {FOOD}Butcher 3, baker 1, food 5, greengrocer 2,{HEALTH}Chemist 2, {CLOTHES}Clothes 4 <ch/ladies> shoes 1, {HAIRDRESSERS}Hairdressers 3{AMUSEMENT Toys 1, travel 1, betting shop 1, video 1, flower 1, gardening 2, pets 1,{ SERVICES}Post office 1, garage 2, travel 1, builder 1, solicitor 1, bank 3, accountant 1, insurance 1,estate agents 3, {GOODS}Hardware 2, electrical 2, secondhand 2, newsagents 1, bookshop 1.{NONE Furniture, men's clothes, child over 3 years, jewellers, material, carpets, sports goods,opticians.
